name: Mysticure
description:
A little girl has gone on an adventure to save the life of her sister with the help of............an owl??

Defeat Monsters and Creatures on this run n shooter in a comic style journey.

Collect the three ingredients by defeating the three Creatures and save your sister!!

ENJOY!

A huge thanks to Archi for helping me make the Menu and Map

(It is a small project which is somewhat incomplete but no future updates will be coming)
